title: Add bwsh as secrets backend for cs
close_reason: Bitwarden integration removed in favor of age encryption

title: Show secrets backend in cs welcome header
description: Display which secrets backend is active when starting a session
close_reason: Added secrets backend display to sync status output

title: Implement local-only sync support
description: Enable cs sync to work without a remote repository. Users should be able to version control their sessions locally without needing GitHub/GitLab. This provides privacy, simpler setup, and an upgrade path (can add remote later). Requires modifying sync_init, sync_push, sync_pull, sync_status, and autosync hooks to detect and handle local-only mode.
close_reason: Closed

title: PowerShell completions for cs command
close_reason: Implemented install.ps1 and completions/cs.ps1

title: Add migrate-backend command to cs-secrets
close_reason: Implemented migrate-backend command

title: PowerShell 7 installer (install.ps1)
close_reason: Implemented install.ps1 and completions/cs.ps1

title: Auto-prompt migration when bws becomes available
description: When bitwarden backend is detected and keychain has existing secrets, prompt user once to migrate. Track prompted state to avoid repeated prompts.
close_reason: Implemented auto-migration prompt when bitwarden becomes available

title: Add auto-sync to hooks
description: Add auto-pull to session-start.sh and auto-push to session-end.sh when auto_sync=on.
close_reason: Added auto-pull to session-start.sh and auto-push to session-end.sh

title: Add bwsh as secrets backend for cs
close_reason: Bitwarden integration removed in favor of age encryption

title: Add git-based session sync
description: Git-based sync for cs sessions. Each session becomes its own git repo with encrypted secrets. Commands: cs -sync init/push/pull/status/auto/clone. Auto-sync on session start/end.
close_reason: Implemented git-based session sync with encrypted secrets

title: Add export-file/import-file to cs-secrets
description: Add commands to export secrets to encrypted file and import from encrypted file. Required for sync portability.
close_reason: Added export-file and import-file commands to cs-secrets

title: Update README with sync docs
description: Document sync feature: setup, clone workflow, command reference, secrets sync requirements.
close_reason: Added Session Sync section to README.md

title: Phase 2: Age command interface
description:
Add cs -secrets age subcommands:
- age init (triggers download + keygen)
- age pubkey
- age add/list/remove
- Update export-file to use age
- Update import-file to detect format
close_reason: Phase 2 complete: export-file/import-file now use age when recipients configured

title: Phase 4: Age sync documentation
description:
- Update docs/secrets.md
- Update README.md features
- Add getting started guide
close_reason: Phase 4 complete: docs/secrets.md and README.md updated with age documentation

title: Add age encryption for secrets sync
description: Replace shared password sync with public-key encryption using age. See .claude/plans/age-secrets-sync.md for full plan.
close_reason: All 4 phases complete: age encryption fully integrated for secrets sync

title: Add shell autocompletion for cs command
description: Implement shell autocompletion (bash/zsh) for cs command. Should complete: session names from ~/.claude-sessions/, global flags (-list, -sync, etc.), sync subcommands (init, push, pull, etc.), secrets subcommands (set, get, list, etc.)
close_reason: Implemented bash and zsh shell completions for cs command

title: Update session banner to Claude Code warm colors
close_reason: Updated to warm Claude palette (rust/orange/gold)

title: Add sync command suite to cs
description: Add cs -sync commands: init, push, pull, status, auto, clone. Plus -s alias.
close_reason: Added sync command suite to cs

title: Phase 1: Core age functions with auto-download
description:
Add to bin/cs-secrets:
- age_ensure_binary() - auto-download if not found
- age_available() - check binary exists
- age_ensure_keypair() - generate if missing
- age_get_pubkey() - return public key  
- age_encrypt_secrets() - encrypt to recipients
- age_decrypt_secrets() - decrypt with identity
close_reason: Implemented core age functions: auto-download, keypair management, encrypt/decrypt, and CLI commands

title: Phase 3: Session integration for age
description:
- Auto-init keypair on first use
- Auto-add self to new sessions
- Migration prompt for existing secrets.enc
close_reason: Phase 3 complete: auto-setup on export, sync_pull integration with age preference
